welcome: Welcome to the Amazon Bedrock Gallery
welcomeDesc: At this Amazon Bedrock Gallery, you can explore your past self using AWS AI technologies
uploadComplete:
Photo uploaded.
Wait 30 seconds to see the AI-generated image on the display.

privacyModal.mandatory: (Mandatory) I agree to the Statement on Collection and Use of Personal Information (see below) and <0>AWS Code of Conduct</0>.
privacyModal.title: Statement on Collection and Use of Personal Information
privacyModal.description: It does not modify or supersede any of the terms of the <0>AWS Privacy Notice</0>.
privacyModal.collectedItemDesc: Name, Photograph taken at the AWS re:Invent 2024
privacyModal.collectionUsePurposeDesc: The photograph will be processed through a Generative AI tool. This Generative AI tool is run on Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker and will create a modified image that is a composite of your image and a Generative AI-generated image(s).
privacyModal.retentionPeriodDesc: The original Photograph will be deleted immediately upon processing. The modified image will be automatically deleted within thirty (30) minutes of creation.
privacyModal.check: You can find information on the delegation of collected personal information <0>here</0>.
privacyModal.message: Please check the checkbox at the top, and enter your name at the bottom.
